about_the_game:
Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy this immersive 3D environment and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. How would that feel solving puzzles far from the noise of a bustling city? Try it out now in the Futuristic Apartment Environment DLC.

Features

new environment - Futuristic Apartment



10 new puzzles

5 difficulties for each puzzle

50 new achievements will be added later on

enhanced camera movement
  • find small details easily

made in Unreal Engine 5
  • cozy, realistic, colorful and immersive full 3D environment
  • real-time physics, powered by Chaos Physics
    • light-weight physics simulation solution used in Fortnite
